items.content_html: Toothscript is a lightweight, modular library packed with advanced TypeScript utility types. It provides tools for strict type validation, transformation, and composition, all while respecting TypeScript's "No New Utility Types" philosophy. Tailored for flexibility and ease of use, Toothscript empowers developers to create precise and reusable type
items.title: vvhybe/toothscript: Toothscript is a lightweight, modular library packed with advanced TypeScript utility types. items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management.
